txt.en: The bootprints turn south-west here, winding around the trees
The Drum Beats Louder
Continue following the bootprints south-west
Look for clues you find and follow where they lead
Continue following the bootprints north-west
Look for clues you find to determine where they lead

'Thank you for looking after this situation in the south. I hope Surâsh is merely waylaid, and the situation is not worse.\n\n'Please, hurry back here after you are done. There is much still to do in Kûr Anzar, and we have only just begun.'
Make your way to Nimasi outside of the camp

'Hashtal-gûr favoured outsider, and praise to the Shâra, who is indeed benevolent. We must find the source of these disappearances - or I fear for all of our safety.

'This is the site where we were supposed to meet with Surâsh, but she never came. Instead I found the banner I gave you. As you can see, there are many bootprints around this area, and some leading away to the south.

'I believe we can follow them to find the source of these disappearances, and the banners. I have not gone myself for fear of disappearing, but with the liberator of Kûr Anzar, I know we can overcome anything these lûbaras throw at us.'
Look for clues to the south-west

'Hurry! Get over here before you're seen!

'Look at all the banners - and the furnishings for that tent. This must be the source of the attacks.

'We need to investigate this camp, I'd wager this is where they are keeping Surâsh. There are so many of them, I wonder from where they all left.'
You notice a series of bootprints moving away from the banner to the south-west
Mizâdi has asked you to accompany the southern scout Nimasi to search for the missing Hamati scout Surâsh.
The bootprints turn south-west here, winding around the hill
Speak with Nimasi in southern Imhûlar.
Examine the banner Nimasi found.
Speak with Nimasi outside of the camp
Follow the bootprints that lead away from the banner south-west and see where they lead.
The bootprints veer due north-west here, toward a copse of dying trees
Speak with Nimasi outside of the camp.
You see a large camp in the distance - and Nimasi beckoning you at its edge
Examine the banner Nimasi found
Follow the bootprints south-west
Speak with Nimasi in southern Imhûlar
Continue following the bootprints that lead away from the banner south-west.
Continue following the bootprints that lead away from the banner north-west.
Make your way to Nimasi on the edge of the camp.
The bootprints veer due north-west here, and seem to get more numerous
You see a large camp in the distance - and Nimasi beckoning you at its edge
